title: Omicron Optimism? Santa Loves Selling Guns 12.07.21
itunes:title: Omicron Optimism? Santa Loves Selling Guns 12.07.21
description:
In episode 1044, Jack and Miles are joined by voice artist and musician Shahjehan Khan to discuss Omicron Update: Initial Numbers Show Less Severe, Dems not sure what to do about Islamophobia…, MSM Headline Tells You Everything You Need to Know About Democrats Right Now, San Fran Suspends Tax on Cannabis to Help Dispensaries Compete With Drug Dealers, The Right Has Been Using Santa Claus to Promote Guns For Decades and more!

  1. Omicron Update: Initial Numbers Show Less Severe
  2. Dems not sure what to do about Islamophobia...
  3. MSM Headline Tells You Everything You Need to Know About Democrats Right Now
  4. San Fran Suspends Tax on Cannabis to Help Dispensaries Compete With Drug Dealers
  5. The Right Has Been Using Santa Claus to Promote Guns For Decades
  6. Sheriff's Office Slammed for Post of Santa Getting Concealed Handgun Permit: 'What is your message to children?'
  7. 10 More Deranged Depictions of Santa Claus
  8. Santa was seen with firearms even when he wasn't in a gun ad. While there isn't anything scandalous about Santa shilling button-down shirts, it is shocking to see St. Nick threatening suicide if he doesn't get said shirts.
  9. When Santa Claus Was Deployed in Wartime
  10. Lobbyist Portrays Armed Santa


Listen: The Kominas

King of the World Podcast

Mushroom Music Instagram @taruntspoon

Listen: Rollin Stone by Red Astaire

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
